doc.story:
<% var events = {}; json.guide.forEach(function(row) { var name = row.event.trim(), description = row.info.trim(), category = row.category.trim(), price = row.price.trim(), location = row.location.trim(), website = row.website_print.trim(), dates = row.dates.trim(), time = row.time.trim(); }); %>
<% for (var e in events) { %>
<%= row.name %>
<%= row.description %>
<%= row.category %>
<%= row.price %>
<%= row.location %>
<%= row.website %>
<%= row.dates %>
<%= row.time %> <% } %>
